content: I'm all set to start watching "Narcos: Mexico". I'll make sure to pace myself and take in the atmosphere and tension of the show. Thanks for the recommendations and insights! By the way, I've been meaning to ask, do you have any recommendations for music or podcasts to listen to while I'm working or studying? I've been listening to the "Lo-Fi Hip Hop" playlist on Spotify, but I'm open to exploring other options.
